# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pygments/formatters/_mapping.py
@source-hash: d42c37ec5b9094d6
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:57:46Z

## Primary Purpose
Auto-generated formatter registry mapping file for Pygments syntax highlighting library. Provides centralized lookup table for all available output formatters with their metadata.

## Key Structure
- **FORMATTERS dictionary (L4-23)**: Complete registry of formatter classes with tuple-based metadata structure
  - Key: Formatter class name
  - Value: 5-tuple containing (module_path, display_name, aliases, file_extensions, description)

## Registered Formatters
- **BBCodeFormatter (L5)**: BBCode markup for bulletin boards
- **Image Formatters (L6-7, L11-12)**: BMP, GIF, PNG, JPEG output via PIL
- **GroffFormatter (L8)**: Groff/troff markup with color/font styling
- **HtmlFormatter (L9)**: HTML4 span tags with CSS classes
- **IRCFormatter (L10)**: IRC color sequences
- **LatexFormatter (L13)**: LaTeX code requiring fancyvrb/color packages
- **NullFormatter (L14)**: Plain text passthrough
- **PangoMarkupFormatter (L15)**: Pango markup for SVG rendering
- **RawTokenFormatter (L16)**: Raw token stream serialization
- **RtfFormatter (L17)**: RTF documents with color info
- **SvgFormatter (L18)**: SVG graphics with positioned text elements
- **Terminal Formatters (L19-21)**: ANSI color sequences for 8-color, 256-color, and true-color terminals
- **TestcaseFormatter (L22)**: Test case formatting utility

## Generation Context
- Auto-generated by `scripts/gen_mapfiles.py` (L1)
- Regenerated via `tox -e mapfiles` command (L2)
- Manual edits discouraged due to generation workflow

## Usage Pattern
Provides lookup mechanism for Pygments formatter discovery and instantiation based on aliases or class names. Each formatter entry includes sufficient metadata for dynamic loading and validation.
